thread.section_title: Greatmats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greatmats | www.greatmats.com
thread.title: Gregg Delong

author: Gregg Delong
title: Gregg Delong
text: I worked with Eric in your support area and he was great. We had multiple calls as he wanted to make sure I ordered exactly what I needed. The mats arrived on time (actually a few days early) and fit just like they were designed. We had a lot of custom cuts and each piece was clearly marked and putting the puzzle together was quite easy! I would recommend Great Mats to anyone and if possible ask for Eric when you call in!
